Author: mrlynch#5735
Content: so... you need to update the daemon by 15th December

Author: mrlynch#5735
Content: after 15th December and before 15th Feb 2019 if you already have funds in a zc (sprout) address you will need to migrate them to a zs (sapling) address

Author: mrlynch#5735
Content:
- you will need to generate a zs (sapling address)
- the migration process will be relatively seamless. there is a dapp for it and you'll need to run one 1 line command and that's it

Author: mrlynch#5735
Content: after 15th December users will not be able to generate zc (sprout) addresses, therefore if there are new users after 15th December they need not worry

Author: burbank#1598
Content: Agreed. I realize that the early folks like us are very likely to be engaged but still

Author: mrlynch#5735
Content: instructions will be posted on how to go through the whole process before 15th December

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: sprout addresses will work until feb 15th, but it is advised to switch to sapling for all usage as soon as possible

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: PIRATE is still just several months old. having a 2 months transition period is a significant percentage of its entire lifetime

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: the exchange servers just cannot keep up with the calcs needed from the sprout tx

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: if we want a running exchange, we cannot be allowing sprout

Author: mrlynch#5735
Content: have edited my comment above to avoid confusion in regards to zc addresses

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: some transactions are literally taking hours to complete
